articles.title: 'If a Muslim becomes PM...': Yati Narsinghanand booked for hate speech again - India Today
articles.description: At an event in Delhi on Sunday, religious leader Yati Narsinghanand purportedly said that if a Muslim was to become the Prime Minister of India, 50 per cent of Hindus would be converted within 20 years. An FIR has been filed against him.
